title: LF GOLD-PLAT TOP AND JUNGLE FOR SERIOUS TEAM
body:
We are looking for Top and jungle who are gold-plat and flex and who actually main the role. Fill this out and we will add you and try you out today. We already have mid adc and support we just need to fill these 2 roles so if you are interested fill out the application and we will try you out.

Application Format
IGN:
Rank:
Role(s):
Champ pool:
Availability:
Shot calling (Y/N)
Discord with working mic (Y/N)
Past team experience:

replies.body: bump STILL LOOKING FOR A JUNGLE

Application Format
IGN: Aserius
Rank: G1 Solo
Role(s): Jungle
Champ pool: Warwick, Kha'zix, Graves, Zac, Elise, Shyvana
Availability: Weeknights and Weekends
Shot calling (Y/N) Y
Discord with working mic (Y/N) Y
Past team experience: I always like playing on teams, so I have a huge experience background with team play and tournaments

IGN: Plzbuffmarksman
Rank:Gold5/solo/silver4/flex. I will be gold by tomorow tho :D 
Role(s):JUG
Champ pool: Graves, Elise, Gragas, Kha.
Availability:All the time
Shot calling (Y/N) Yes, My shot calling style however is teaching my team how to communicate well and make decisions based off all the info possible. Not really a Dictator 
Discord with working mic (Y/N)Yeah 
Past team experience: A bit in some tournaments and stuff

IGN: HeavenzDemon
Rank: Gold III Solo, Gold III Flex
Role(s): Top
Champ pool: Highly diverse in the top lane. These are the main 5 I play currently, but I always meta shift my pool. {{champion:57}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:50}} 
Availability: Always available after 4pm EST
Shot calling (Y/N) Yes, I am really big on backing up information flow throughout the game as well as providing high macro calls.
Discord with working mic (Y/N) Yes
Past team experience: I have been on several basic league teams, nothing that went over competitive outside of competeleague.

Application Format

Role(s): any exp adc
Champ pool: anything
Availability: after 7pm est on weekend anytime
Shot calling (Y/N) Y
Discord with working mic (Y/N) Y
Past team experience: Y

IGN: Tilted Hecarim
Rank: G1 Solo, s3 promos flex
Role(s): Jungle
Champ pool: Jayce Hecarim Yasuo natilus nunu (yes, all these champ in the jungle role)
Availability: 3 - 7 PM EST on weekdays, weekends mostly the whole day depending on schedule
Shot calling (Y/N) Yes
Discord with working mic (Y/N) Yes
Past team experience: nope

IGN: Malignant Teemo
Rank: Solo G4, Flex G2
Role(s): Top/adc
Champ pool: Top 3 are Teemo, Darius, Fiora, but there are very few top laners I can't play. 
Availability: Very flexible, college student
Shot calling (Y/N) Have experience, yes
Discord with working mic (Y/N) Yes
Past team experience: The highest I've ever been on a team is high gold. The highest I've ever personally been ranked is plat 5, but it was pre season :/
